summary.span: 表示對 SQL Server 資料庫的連線。

span.span: Represents a connection to a SQL Server database.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件表示 SQL Server 資料來源的唯一工作階段。A object represents a unique session to a SQL Server data source. 具有用戶端/伺服器資料庫系統，它就相當於伺服器的網路連線項目。With a client/server database system, it is equivalent to a network connection to the server. 可搭配使用和來提升效能，當連接到 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫。 is used together with and to increase performance when connecting to a Microsoft SQL Server database. 第三方的所有 SQL Server 產品和其他的 OLE DB 支援的資料來源，請使用。For all third-party SQL Server products and other OLE DB-supported data sources, use . 當您建立的執行個體，所有屬性都設為其初始值。When you create an instance of , all properties are set to their initial values. 如需這些值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 請參閱取得一份連接字串中的關鍵字。See for a list of the keywords in a connection string. 如果移出範圍，因此不會關閉。If the goes out of scope, it won't be closed. 因此，您必須明確地關閉連接呼叫`Close`或`Dispose`。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`. `Close` 和`Dispose`相同的功能。`Close` and `Dispose` are functionally equivalent. 如果連接共用值`Pooling`設定為`true`或`yes`，基礎連接傳回連接集區。If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, the underlying connection is returned back to the connection pool. 相反地，如果`Pooling`設定為`false`或`no`，實際關閉基礎連線到伺服器。On the other hand, if `Pooling` is set to `false` or `no`, the underlying connection to the server is actually closed. > [!NOTE] > 從連接集區中擷取連接或將連接傳回連接集區時，系統不會在伺服器上引發登入和登出事件，因為當連接傳回連接集區時，連接實際上並未關閉。Login and logout events will not be raised on the server when a connection is fetched from or returned to the connection pool, because the connection is not actually closed when it is returned to the connection pool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [SQL Server 連共用ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md). 若要確保一律會關閉連線，開啟 內部連接`using`封鎖，如下列程式碼片段所示。To ensure that connections are always closed, open the connection inside of a `using` block, as shown in the following code fragment. 這麼做可確保程式碼結束該區塊時，會自動關閉連線。Doing so ensures that the connection is automatically closed when the code exits the block. ```vb Using connection As New SqlConnection(connectionString) connection.Open() ' Do work here; connection closed on following line. End Using ``` ```csharp using (SqlConnection connection = new SqlConnection(connectionString)) { connection.Open(); // Do work here; connection closed on following line. } ``` > [!NOTE] > 若要部署高效能應用程式，您必須使用連接共用。To deploy high-performance applications, you must use connection pooling. 當您使用.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 時，您不必啟用連接共用，因為提供者會自動管理雖然您可以修改某些設定。When you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, you do not have to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically, although you can modify some settings. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [SQL Server 連共用ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md). 如果所執行的方法產生，則保持在開啟狀態時的嚴重性層級為 19 或更小。If a is generated by the method executing a , the remains open when the severity level is 19 or less. 伺服器時的嚴重性層級 20 或更高，通常會關閉。When the severity level is 20 or greater, the server ordinarily closes the . 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. 建立的執行個體的應用程式物件可能需要的所有直接和間接呼叫者有足夠的權限的程式碼，藉由設定宣告式或命令式安全性要求。An application that creates an instance of the object can require all direct and indirect callers to have sufficient permission to the code by setting declarative or imperative security demands. 可使用的安全性要求物件。 makes security demands using the object. 使用者可以確認他們的程式碼使用具有足夠的權限物件。Users can verify that their code has sufficient permissions by using the object. 使用者和系統管理員也可以使用[Caspol.exe （程式碼存取安全性原則工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)修改電腦、 使用者和企業層級的安全性原則。Users and administrators can also use the [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md) to modify security policy at the machine, user, and enterprise levels. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [.NET 的安全性](~/docs/standard/security/index.md)。For more information, see [Security in .NET](~/docs/standard/security/index.md). 如需示範如何使用安全性要求的範例，請參閱 < [ 程式碼存取安全性和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md)。For an example demonstrating how to use security demands, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md). 如需有關如何處理來自伺服器的警告和參考用訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱[連線事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。For more information about handling warning and informational messages from the server, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md). 如需有關 SQL Server 引擎錯誤與錯誤訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Database Engine 事件和錯誤](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-events-and-errors)。For more information about SQL Server engine errors and error messages, see [Database Engine Events and Errors](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-events-and-errors). > [!CAUTION] > 您可以強制 TCP，而不是共用的記憶體。You can force TCP instead of shared memory. 您可以這麼前面加上 tcp： 連接中的伺服器名稱的字串，或者您可以使用 localhost。You can do that by prefixing tcp: to the server name in the connection string or you can use localhost. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates a and a . 已開啟並設定為如。The is opened and set as the for the . 此範例接著會呼叫。The example then calls . 若要這麼做，連接字串和查詢字串傳遞至[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]INSERT 陳述式。To accomplish this, the is passed a connection string and a query string that is a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] INSERT statement. 使用的程式碼結束時自動關閉連接區塊。The connection is closed automatically when the code exits the using block. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Starts a database transaction.
An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令會對應至 SQL Server 實作的 BEGIN TRANSACTION。This command maps to the SQL Server implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION. 您必須明確地認可或回復交易使用或方法。You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the or method. 若要確定.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 交易管理模型會正確執行，請避免使用其他的交易管理模式，例如 SQL Server 提供的。To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by SQL Server. > [!NOTE] > 如果您未指定隔離等級，則會使用預設隔離等級。If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level is used. 若要指定隔離等級方法，使用採用的多載`iso`參數 ()。To specify an isolation level with the method, use the overload that takes the `iso` parameter (). 設定交易的隔離等級會保存在交易完成之後，直到連接已關閉或處置。The isolation level set for a transaction persists after the transaction is completed and until the connection is closed or disposed. 隔離層級設定為**快照集**中未啟用 snapshot 隔離等級的資料庫不會擲回例外狀況。Setting the isolation level to **Snapshot** in a database where the snapshot isolation level is not enabled does not throw an exception. 完成交易使用的預設隔離等級。The transaction will complete using the default isolation level. > [!CAUTION] > 如果啟動交易層級 16 或更高的錯誤，就會發生在伺服器上，將不會回復交易之前叫用方法。If a transaction is started and a level 16 or higher error occurs on the server, the transaction will not be rolled back until the method is invoked. 擲回任何例外狀況**ExecuteReader**。No exception is thrown on **ExecuteReader**. > [!CAUTION] > 當您的查詢傳回大量的資料和呼叫`BeginTransaction`、因為 SQL Server 不允許平行交易使用 MARS 時，會擲回。When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a is thrown because SQL Server does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS. 若要避免這個問題，一律關聯交易命令、 連接，或兩者之前任何讀取器已開啟。To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open. 如需有關 SQL Server 交易的詳細資訊，請參閱[交易 & Amp;#40;transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates a and a . 它也會示範如何使用，則，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , a , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令會對應至 SQL Server 實作的 BEGIN TRANSACTION。This command maps to the SQL Server implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION. 您必須明確地認可或回復交易使用或方法。You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the or method. 若要確定.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 交易管理模型會正確執行，請避免使用其他的交易管理模式，例如 SQL Server 提供的。To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by SQL Server. > [!NOTE] > 認可或回復交易之後，交易的隔離等級會持續處於自動認可模式 （SQL Server 預設值） 的所有後續命令。After a transaction is committed or rolled back, the isolation level of the transaction persists for all subsequent commands that are in autocommit mode (the SQL Server default). 這會產生非預期的結果，例如保存和鎖定其他使用者的資料列外 REPEATABLE READ 隔離等級。This can produce unexpected results, such as an isolation level of REPEATABLE READ persisting and locking other users out of a row. 若要重設 (READ COMMITTED) 的預設隔離等級，執行[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]設定交易隔離等級 READ COMMITTED 的陳述式或呼叫後面來立即。To reset the isolation level to the default (READ COMMITTED), execute the [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED statement, or call followed immediately by . 如需有關 SQL Server 隔離層級的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 交易隔離等級](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transaction-isolation-levels)。For more information on SQL Server isolation levels, see [Transaction Isolation Levels](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transaction-isolation-levels). 如需有關 SQL Server 交易的詳細資訊，請參閱[交易 & Amp;#40;transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). > [!CAUTION] > 當您的查詢傳回大量的資料和呼叫`BeginTransaction`、因為 SQL Server 不允許平行交易使用 MARS 時，會擲回。When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a is thrown because SQL Server does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS. 若要避免這個問題，一律關聯交易命令、 連接，或兩者之前任何讀取器已開啟。To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates a and a . 它也會示範如何使用，則，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , a , and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令會對應至 SQL Server 實作的 BEGIN TRANSACTION。This command maps to the SQL Server implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION. 長度`transactionName`參數不能超過 32 個字元; 否則會擲回例外狀況。The length of the `transactionName` parameter must not exceed 32 characters; otherwise an exception will be thrown. 中的值`transactionName`參數可以用於稍後呼叫然後在`savePoint`參數方法。The value in the `transactionName` parameter can be used in later calls to and in the `savePoint` parameter of the method. 您必須明確地認可或回復交易使用或方法。You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the or method. 若要確定[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]資料提供者的 SQL Server 交易管理模型的執行是否正確，請避免使用其他的交易管理模式，例如 SQL Server 所提供。To make sure that the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for SQL Server transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by SQL Server. 如需有關 SQL Server 交易的詳細資訊，請參閱[交易 & Amp;#40;transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). > [!CAUTION] > 當您的查詢傳回大量的資料和呼叫`BeginTransaction`、因為 SQL Server 不允許平行交易使用 MARS 時，會擲回。When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a is thrown because SQL Server does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS. 若要避免這個問題，一律關聯交易命令、 連接，或兩者之前任何讀取器已開啟。To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open. ## Examples 下列範例會建立和。The following example creates a and a . 它也會示範如何使用，則，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , a , and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您在 Windows Server 上使用 SQL Server 時，開發人員可以利用可讓用戶端應用程式，提供目前和新密碼，才能變更現有密碼的功能。When you are using SQL Server on Windows Server, developers can take advantage of functionality that lets the client application supply both the current and a new password in order to change the existing password. 應用程式可以實作功能，例如初始登入期間提示使用者輸入新密碼，如果舊的密碼已過期，而且可以完成此作業，而不需系統管理員介入。Applications can implement functionality such as prompting the user for a new password during initial login if the old one has expired, and this operation can be completed without administrator intervention. 方法會變更使用者指示中所提供的 SQL Server 密碼`connectionString`參數中提供的值來`newPassword`參數。The method changes the SQL Server password for the user indicated in the supplied `connectionString` parameter to the value supplied in the `newPassword` parameter. 如果連接字串會包含整合式安全性的選項 (也就是"Integrated 的 Security = True"或同等權限)，會擲回例外狀況。If the connection string includes the option for integrated security (that is, "Integrated Security=True" or the equivalent), an exception is thrown. 若要判斷已過期的密碼，呼叫方法會引發。To determine that the password has expired, calling the method raises a . 為了表示，包含連接字串內的密碼必須重設，例外狀況的屬性包含值 18487 或 18488。In order to indicate that the password that is contained within the connection string must be reset, the property for the exception contains the status value 18487 or 18488. 第一個值 (18487) 表示的密碼已過期，第二個 (18488) 表示必須在登入之前重設密碼。The first value (18487) indicates that the password has expired and the second (18488) indicates that the password must be reset before logging in. 這個方法會開啟自己連接到伺服器，要求密碼變更時，並關閉連線，因為它已完成。This method opens its own connection to the server, requests the password change, and closes the connection as soon as it has completed. 此連線不擷取，也不會傳回 SQL Server 連接集區。This connection is not retrieved from, nor returned to, the SQL Server connection pool. ## Examples 變更密碼的簡單範例如下：The following is a simple example of changing a password: ```csharp class Program { static void Main(string[] args) { System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangePassword( "Data Source=a_server;Initial Catalog=a_database;UID=user;PWD=old_password", "new_password"); } } ``` ```vb Module Module1 Sub Main() System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangePassword( "Data Source=a_server;Initial Catalog=a_database;UID=user;PWD=old_password", "new_password") End Sub End Module ``` 下列主控台應用程式示範如何變更使用者的密碼，因為目前的密碼已過期的相關問題。The following console application demonstrates the issues involved in changing a user's password because the current password has expired. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlConnection.ChangePassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlConnection.ChangePassword/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlConnection.ChangePassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlConnection.ChangePassword/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您連接到，不論哪一個版本的伺服器的運作方式，但是擴充的事件記錄檔以及有關連接性信號緩衝錯誤的項目將不會出現在[!INCLUDE[sskatmai_r2](~/includes/sskatmai-r2-md.md)]及更早版本。 works regardless of which version of the server you connect to, but extended events logs and entry on connectivity ring buffer errors will not be present in [!INCLUDE[sskatmai_r2](~/includes/sskatmai-r2-md.md)] and earlier. 您可以在擴充的事件記錄檔，以查看失敗是否在伺服器上已啟用的擴充的事件記錄連接識別碼，是否找到的連接識別碼。You can locate the connection ID in the extended events log to see if the failure was on the server if the extended event for logging connection ID is enabled. 您也可以在連接信號緩衝區中找到的連接識別碼 ([連線疑難排解 SQL Server 2008 中與連接信號緩衝區](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=207752)) 針對特定連接錯誤。You can also locate the connection ID in the connection ring buffer ([Connectivity troubleshooting in SQL Server 2008 with the Connectivity Ring Buffer](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=207752)) for certain connection errors. 如果連接識別碼不是在連接信號緩衝區中，您可以假設發生網路錯誤。If the connection ID is not in the connection ring buffer, you can assume a network error.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉與資料庫的連接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the database.

summary.span: 這是關閉任何開啟連接的慣用方法。

span.span: This is the preferred method of closing any open connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法回復任何暫止交易。The method rolls back any pending transactions. 然後，它會釋放至連接集區中，連接或關閉連接，如果連接共用已停用。It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. > [!NOTE] > 開始使用的交易擱置[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]或時如果啟用連線共用，會重設連接，自動會回復。Pending transactions started using [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] or are automatically rolled back when the connection is reset if connection pooling is enabled. 如果連接共用已關閉，會回復交易之後`SqlConnection.Close`呼叫。If connection pooling is off, the transaction is rolled back after `SqlConnection.Close` is called. 透過啟動的交易透過控制`System.Transactions`基礎結構，並不會受到`SqlConnection.Close`。Transactions started through are controlled through the `System.Transactions` infrastructure, and are not affected by `SqlConnection.Close`. 應用程式可以呼叫一次以上。An application can call more than one time. 會不產生任何例外狀況。No exception is generated. 如果移出範圍，因此不會關閉。If the goes out of scope, it won't be closed. 因此，您必須明確地關閉連接呼叫`Close`或`Dispose`。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`. `Close` 和`Dispose`相同的功能。`Close` and `Dispose` are functionally equivalent. 如果連接共用值`Pooling`設定為`true`或`yes`，基礎連接傳回連接集區。If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, the underlying connection is returned back to the connection pool. 相反地，如果`Pooling`設定為`false`或`no`、 基礎與伺服器連線已關閉。On the other hand, if `Pooling` is set to `false` or `no`, the underlying connection to the server is closed. > [!NOTE] > 從連接集區中擷取連接或將連接傳回連接集區時，系統不會在伺服器上引發登入和登出事件，因為當連接傳回連接集區時，連接實際上並未關閉。Login and logout events will not be raised on the server when a connection is fetched from or returned to the connection pool, because the connection is not actually closed when it is returned to the connection pool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [SQL Server 連共用ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md). > [!CAUTION] > 請勿呼叫`Close`或是`Dispose`連線、 DataReader 或在任何其他 managed 的物件上`Finalize`您類別的方法。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a Connection, a DataReader, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在完成項中，您應該僅釋放類別直接擁有的 unmanaged 的資源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果類別未擁有任何 Unmanaged 資源，請不要在類別定義中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立、 開啟它時，會顯示其部分屬性。The following example creates a , opens it, displays some of its properties. 連線會自動關閉結尾`using`區塊。The connection is automatically closed at the end of the `using` block. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否要針對根據已啟用 Always Encrypted 的資料庫執行的參數化查詢，啟用 (true) 或停用 (false) 查詢中繼資料快取。

summary.span: 預設值為 true。

span.span: The default value is true.

value.span: 如果已啟用查詢中繼資料快取，即會傳回 true；否則為 false。

span.span: Returns true if query metadata caching is enabled; otherwise false.

value.span: true 為預設值。

span.span: true is the default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數化查詢，SqlClient 會往返到 SQL Server 的參數中繼資料，以查看哪個參數需要加密和方式 （哪些金鑰和演算法應使用）。For parameterized queries, SqlClient makes a roundtrip to SQL Server for parameter metadata, to see which parameter it needs to encrypt and how (which keys and algorithms should be used). 如果應用程式會多次呼叫相同的查詢，會降低應用程式效能，每次伺服器會建立額外的往返。If the application calls the same query multiple times, an extra roundtrip is made to the server each time, which degrades application performance. 具有**ColumnEncryptionQueryMetadataCacheEnabled**設定為 true，如果多次呼叫相同的查詢，需往返伺服器，會進行一次。With **ColumnEncryptionQueryMetadataCacheEnabled** set to true, if the same query is called multiple times, the roundtrip to the server will be made only once. 快取有一個非可設定的最大大小參數設為 2000年查詢。The cache has a non-configurable Max size parameter that is set to 2000 queries.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ColumnEncryptionTrustedMasterKeyPaths As IDictionary(Of String, IList(Of String))

summary.span: 可讓您為資料庫伺服器設定受信任機碼路徑的清單。

span.span: Allows you to set a list of trusted key paths for a database server.

summary.span: 如果在處理應用程式查詢時，驅動程式收到的機碼路徑不在清單上，查詢就會失敗。

span.span: If while processing an application query the driver receives a key path that is not on the list, the query will fail.

summary.span: 這個屬性會提供額外的保護以對抗安全性攻擊，事關受危害的 SQL Server 提供虛構的機碼路徑，這有可能導致金鑰存放區認證洩漏。

span.span: This property provides additional protection against security attacks that involve a compromised SQL Server providing fake key paths, which may lead to leaking key store credentials.

value.span: 資料行加密的受信任的主要機碼路徑清單。

span.span: The list of trusted master key paths for the column encryption.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類似於 OLE DB 連接字串，但並不相同。The is similar to an OLE DB connection string, but is not identical. 不同於 OLE DB 或 ADO，連接字串，則會傳回等同於使用者設定，安全性資訊 Persist Security Info 的值設定為如果減去`false`（預設值）。Unlike OLE DB or ADO, the connection string that is returned is the same as the user-set , minus security information if the Persist Security Info value is set to `false` (default). .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 不會保存或傳回連接字串中的密碼，除非您將 Persist Security Info `true`。The .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server does not persist or return the password in a connection string unless you set Persist Security Info to `true`. 您可以使用屬性，以連接到資料庫。You can use the property to connect to a database. 下列範例說明一般連接字串。The following example illustrates a typical connection string. ``` "Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=true;Initial Catalog=Northwind;server=(local)" ``` 使用新在執行階段建構有效的連接字串。Use the new to construct valid connection strings at run time. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[連接字串建置器](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md)。For more information, see [Connection String Builders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md). 連接關閉時，才可以設定屬性。The property can be set only when the connection is closed. 許多連接字串值都有對應的唯讀屬性。Many of the connection string values have corresponding read-only properties. 設定連接字串時，這些屬性會更新，除了偵測到錯誤。When the connection string is set, these properties are updated, except when an error is detected. 在此情況下，會更新任何屬性。In this case, none of the properties are updated. 屬性會傳回只包含在這些設定。 properties return only those settings that are contained in the . 若要連接到本機電腦上，請為伺服器指定"(local)"。To connect to a local computer, specify "(local)" for the server. 如果未指定伺服器名稱，連接將會嘗試在本機電腦上的預設執行個體。If a server name is not specified, a connection will be attempted to the default instance on the local computer. 重設關閉的連接上重設所有連接字串值 （和相關的屬性） 包括密碼。Resetting the on a closed connection resets all connection string values (and related properties) including the password. 比方說，如果您設定連接字串，包含"資料庫 = AdventureWorks"，然後重設的連接字串 」 資料來源 = myserver; 整合式的安全性 = true"，屬性不再設定為 「 AdventureWorks 」。For example, if you set a connection string that includes "Database= AdventureWorks", and then reset the connection string to "Data Source=myserver;Integrated Security=true", the property is no longer set to "AdventureWorks". 連接字串會在設定之後，立即進行剖析。The connection string is parsed immediately after being set. 如果剖析時，執行階段例外狀況，例如發現語法錯誤，就會產生。If errors in syntax are found when parsing, a runtime exception, such as , is generated. 嘗試開啟連接時，才可以找到其他錯誤。Other errors can be found only when an attempt is made to open the connection. 連接字串的基本格式包含一系列以分號隔開的關鍵字/值組。The basic format of a connection string includes a series of keyword/value pairs separated by semicolons. 等號 (=) 會連接每個關鍵字和其值。The equal sign (=) connects each keyword and its value. 若要加入包含分號、 單引號字元或雙引號字元的值，值必須用雙引號括住。To include values that contain a semicolon, single-quote character, or double-quote character, the value must be enclosed in double quotation marks. 如果此值會包含一個分號和雙引號字元，值可以是單引號括住。If the value contains both a semicolon and a double-quote character, the value can be enclosed in single quotation marks. 單一引號也很有用，如果此值以雙引號字元開頭的。The single quotation mark is also useful if the value starts with a double-quote character. 相反地，如果值以單引號開頭，可以使用雙引號。Conversely, the double quotation mark can be used if the value starts with a single quotation mark. 如果此值包含單引號和雙引號字元，用來括住值的引號字元必須成對，每次出現的值。If the value contains both single-quote and double-quote characters, the quotation mark character used to enclose the value must be doubled every time it occurs within the value. 中的字串值包含開頭或結尾空格，值必須用單引號或雙引號括住。To include preceding or trailing spaces in the string value, the value must be enclosed in either single quotation marks or double quotation marks. 會忽略整數、 布林值或列舉的值前後的任何前置或尾端空格，即使以引號括住。Any leading or trailing spaces around integer, Boolean, or enumerated values are ignored, even if enclosed in quotation marks. 不過，在字串常值關鍵字或值的空格會保留。However, spaces within a string literal keyword or value are preserved. 可能的連接字串內使用單引號或雙引號的引號，而不使用分隔符號 (例如，資料來源 = my'Server] 或 [資料來源 = 我的 「 伺服器)，除非引號字元是在值中的第一個或最後一個字元。Single or double quotation marks may be used within a connection string without using delimiters (for example, Data Source= my'Server or Data Source= my"Server), unless a quotation mark character is the first or last character in the value. 關鍵字不區分大小寫。Keywords are not case sensitive. 下表列出中的關鍵字值的有效名稱。The following table lists the valid names for keyword values within the . |關鍵字Keyword|預設Default|描述Description| |-------------|-------------|-----------------| |AddrAddr|N/AN/A|同義字**資料來源**。Synonym of **Data Source**.| |地址Address|N/AN/A|同義字**資料來源**。Synonym of **Data Source**.| |應用程式App|N/AN/A|同義字**應用程式名稱**。Synonym of **Application Name**.| |Application NameApplication Name|N/AN/A|應用程式或 '.NET SQLClient 資料提供者 ' 如果不提供任何應用程式名稱的名稱。The name of the application, or '.NET SQLClient Data Provider' if no application name is provided.

應用程式名稱可以是 128 個字元或更少。An application name can be 128 characters or less.| |`ApplicationIntent`|`ReadWrite`|連接到伺服器時，會宣告應用程式工作負載類型。Declares the application workload type when connecting to a server. 可能的值為 `ReadOnly` 和 `ReadWrite`。Possible values are `ReadOnly` and `ReadWrite`. 例如：For example:

`ApplicationIntent=ReadOnly`

如需 AlwaysOn 可用性群組的 SqlClient 支援詳細資訊，請參閱[高可用性、嚴重損壞修復的 SqlClient 支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sqlclient-support-for-high-availability-disaster-recovery.md)。For more information about SqlClient support for Always On Availability Groups, see [SqlClient Support for High Availability, Disaster Recovery](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sqlclient-support-for-high-availability-disaster-recovery.md).| |Asynchronous ProcessingAsynchronous Processing

-或--or-

AsyncAsync|' false''false'|當`true`，可讓非同步作業的支援。When `true`, enables asynchronous operation support. 可辨識的值為 `true`、`false`、`yes` 和 `no`。Recognized values are `true`, `false`, `yes`, and `no`.

從 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 開始，將會忽略此屬性。This property is ignored beginning in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 如需 SqlClient 支援進行非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步程式設計](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about SqlClient support for asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).| |AttachDBFilenameAttachDBFilename

-或--or-

擴充屬性Extended Properties

-或--or-

初始檔案名稱Initial File Name|N/AN/A|包含可附加資料庫的完整路徑名稱的主要資料庫檔案名稱。The name of the primary database file, including the full path name of an attachable database. AttachDBFilename 只支援副檔名為.mdf 的主要資料檔。AttachDBFilename is only supported for primary data files with an .mdf extension.

在連接字串指定 AttachDBFileName 索引鍵的值，如果資料庫連接，即成為連接的預設資料庫。If the value of the AttachDBFileName key is specified in the connection string, the database is attached and becomes the default database for the connection.

如果未指定此金鑰，而且先前已附加資料庫，不會重新附加資料庫。If this key is not specified and if the database was previously attached, the database will not be reattached. 先前附加的資料庫會作為連線的預設資料庫。The previously attached database will be used as the default database for the connection.

如果此機碼時指定 AttachDBFileName 索引鍵，此機碼值將用於做為別名。If this key is specified together with the AttachDBFileName key, the value of this key will be used as the alias. 不過，如果名稱已經用於另一個附加的資料庫，連接將會失敗。However, if the name is already used in another attached database, the connection will fail.

使用 DataDirectory 替代字串可能絕對或相對路徑。The path may be absolute or relative by using the DataDirectory substitution string. 使用 DataDirectory 時，如果資料庫檔案必須存在於替代字串所指向之目錄的子目錄中。If DataDirectory is used, the database file must exist within a subdirectory of the directory pointed to by the substitution string. **注意：** 遠端伺服器、 HTTP 和 UNC 路徑名稱不支援。**Note:** Remote server, HTTP, and UNC path names are not supported.

必須指定資料庫名稱使用關鍵字 'database' （或其別名之一），如下所示：The database name must be specified with the keyword 'database' (or one of its aliases) as in the following:

"AttachDbFileName=|DataDirectory|\data\YourDB.mdf;integrated security=true;database=YourDatabase"

如果在與資料檔相同的目錄中有記錄檔存在，則會產生錯誤，而且在附加主要資料檔時會使用 'database' 關鍵字。An error will be generated if a log file exists in the same directory as the data file and the 'database' keyword is used when attaching the primary data file. 在此情形下，請移除此記錄檔。In this case, remove the log file. 一旦附加資料庫之後，就會根據實體路徑自動產生新的記錄檔。Once the database is attached, a new log file will be automatically generated based on the physical path.| |驗證Authentication|N/AN/A|使用的驗證方法[連接到 SQL 資料庫使用 Azure Active Directory 驗證](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/sql-database-aad-authentication/#7-connect-to-your-database-by-using-azure-active-directory-identities)。The authentication method used for [Connecting to SQL Database By Using Azure Active Directory Authentication](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/sql-database-aad-authentication/#7-connect-to-your-database-by-using-azure-active-directory-identities).

有效值為：Valid values are:

Active Directory 整合、 Active Directory 密碼，Sql 密碼。Active Directory Integrated, Active Directory Password, Sql Password.| |資料行加密設定Column Encryption Setting|N/AN/A|啟用或停用[Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine?view=sql-server-2017)連接的功能。Enables or disables [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine?view=sql-server-2017) functionality for the connection.| |連接逾時Connect Timeout

-或--or-

Connection TimeoutConnection Timeout

-或--or-

等候逾時Timeout|1515|長度 （以秒為單位） 的時間等候連接到伺服器之前終止嘗試並產生錯誤。The length of time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to the server before terminating the attempt and generating an error.

有效的值為大於或等於 0 且小於或等於 2147483647。Valid values are greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 2147483647.

開啟連線到 Azure SQL Database 時, 設定連接逾時為 30 秒。When opening a connection to a Azure SQL Database, set the connection timeout to 30 seconds.| |連接的存留期Connection Lifetime

-或--or-

Load Balance TimeoutLoad Balance Timeout|00|當連接傳回集區時，會將其建立時間與目前時間進行比較，如果該時間範圍 (秒) 超過 `Connection Lifetime` 指定的值，則會損毀連接。When a connection is returned to the pool, its creation time is compared with the current time, and the connection is destroyed if that time span (in seconds) exceeds the value specified by `Connection Lifetime`. 這在叢集組態中很有用，可在執行中伺服器與剛連線的伺服器之間強制負載平衡。This is useful in clustered configurations to force load balancing between a running server and a server just brought online.

值為零 (0) 會造成集區的連接具有最大的連線逾時。A value of zero (0) causes pooled connections to have the maximum connection timeout.| |ConnectRetryCountConnectRetryCount|11|控制項的用戶端識別出閒置連線失敗之後嘗試重新連線次數。Controls the number of reconnection attempts after the client identifies an idle connection failure. 有效值為 0 到 255。Valid values are 0 to 255. 預設為 1。The default is 1. 0 表示不嘗試重新連線 （停用連線恢復功能）。0 means do not attempt to reconnect (disable connection resiliency).

如需閒置連接恢復功能的詳細資訊，請參閱[技術文件-閒置連接恢復功能](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=393996)。For additional information about idle connection resiliency, see [Technical Article - Idle Connection Resiliency](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=393996).| |ConnectRetryIntervalConnectRetryInterval|1010|指定每個連接重試嘗試 (ConnectRetryCount) 之間的時間。Specifies the time between each connection retry attempt (ConnectRetryCount). 有效值為 1 到 60 秒 (預設 = 10)、 套用之後第一次嘗試重新連線。Valid values are 1 to 60 seconds (default=10), applied after the first reconnection attempt. 偵測到中斷的連線時，用戶端會立即嘗試重新連線;這是第一次嘗試重新連線，而且只有 ConnectRetryCount 大於 0。When a broken connection is detected, the client immediately attempts to reconnect; this is the first reconnection attempt and only occurs if ConnectRetryCount is greater than 0. 如果第一次嘗試重新連線失敗，且 ConnectRetryCount 大於 1，則用戶端會等待 ConnectRetryInterval 嘗試第二個和後續的重新連線嘗試。If the first reconnection attempt fails and ConnectRetryCount is greater than 1, the client waits ConnectRetryInterval to try the second and subsequent reconnection attempts.

如需閒置連接恢復功能的詳細資訊，請參閱[技術文件-閒置連接恢復功能](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=393996)。For additional information about idle connection resiliency, see [Technical Article - Idle Connection Resiliency](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=393996).| |Context ConnectionContext Connection|' false''false'|`true` 如果應該進行 SQL Server 同處理序連線。`true` if an in-process connection to SQL Server should be made.| |Current LanguageCurrent Language

-或--or-

語言Language|N/AN/A|設定用於資料庫伺服器的警告或錯誤訊息的語言。Sets the language used for database server warning or error messages.

語言名稱可以是 128 個字元或更少。The language name can be 128 characters or less.| |資料來源Data Source

-或--or-

伺服器Server

-或--or-

地址Address

-或--or-

AddrAddr

-或--or-

網路位址Network Address|N/AN/A|要連接的 SQL Server 執行個體的名稱或網路位址。The name or network address of the instance of SQL Server to which to connect. 可以在伺服器名稱後面指定的連接埠號碼：The port number can be specified after the server name:

`server=tcp:servername, portnumber`

在指定的本機執行個體時，一律使用 (local)。When specifying a local instance, always use (local). 若要強制通訊協定，加入下列前置詞的其中一個：To force a protocol, add one of the following prefixes:

`np:(local), tcp:(local), lpc:(local)`

從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，您也可以連接，如下所示至 LocalDB 資料庫：Beginning in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can also connect to a LocalDB database as follows:

`server=(localdb)\\myInstance`

如需有關 LocalDB 的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [LocalDB 的 SqlClient 支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sqlclient-support-for-localdb.md)。For more information about LocalDB, see [SqlClient Support for LocalDB](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/sqlclient-support-for-localdb.md).

**資料來源**必須使用 TCP 或具名管道的格式。**Data Source** must use the TCP format or the Named Pipes format.

TCP 格式如下所示：TCP format is as follows:

-tcp:\<主機名稱 >\\< 執行個體名稱\>- tcp:\\\
-tcp:\<主機名稱 >，\- tcp:\,\

TCP 格式的開頭必須前置詞 「 tcp:"且後面跟著的資料庫執行個體，所指定的主機名稱和執行個體名稱。The TCP format must start with the prefix "tcp:" and is followed by the database instance, as specified by a host name and an instance name. 連接到 Azure SQL Database 時，不適用這種格式。This format is not applicable when connecting to Azure SQL Database. 指定沒有任何通訊協定時，TCP 會自動選取連接到 Azure SQL Database。TCP is automatically selected for connections to Azure SQL Database when no protocol is specified.

主機名稱必須指定其中一種以下列方式：The host name MUST be specified in one of the following ways:

- NetBIOSName- NetBIOSName
- IPv4Address- IPv4Address
- IPv6Address- IPv6Address

執行個體名稱用來解析為特定的 TCP/IP 通訊埠編號，其裝載的資料庫執行個體。The instance name is used to resolve to a particular TCP/IP port number on which a database instance is hosted. 或者，也允許直接指定 TCP/IP 通訊埠編號。Alternatively, specifying a TCP/IP port number directly is also allowed. 如果兩者都執行個體名稱和連接埠號碼不存在，則會使用預設資料庫執行個體。If both instance name and port number are not present, the default database instance is used.

具名管道格式如下所示：The Named Pipes format is as follows:

-np:\\\\< 主機名稱\>\pipe\\< 管道名稱\>- np:\\\\\pipe\\

具名管道格式的開頭必須前置詞"np:"且後面跟著具名的管道名稱。The Named Pipes format MUST start with the prefix "np:" and is followed by a named pipe name.

主機名稱必須指定其中一種以下列方式：The host name MUST be specified in one of the following ways:

- NetBIOSName- NetBIOSName
- IPv4Address- IPv4Address
- IPv6Address- IPv6Address

管道名稱用來識別.NET Framework 應用程式將連接的資料庫執行個體。The pipe name is used to identify the database instance to which the .NET Framework application will be connected.

如果的值**網路**指定索引鍵，則前置詞 「 tcp:"和"np: 「 不應指定。If the value of the **Network** key is specified, the prefixes "tcp:" and "np:" should not be specified. **注意：** 您可以強制使用 TCP，而不是共用的記憶體，可能由前面加上**tcp:** 在連接字串，或使用為伺服器名稱**localhost**。**Note:** You can force the use of TCP instead of shared memory, either by prefixing **tcp:** to the server name in the connection string, or by using **localhost**.| |EncryptEncrypt|' false''false'|當`true`，SQL Server 的伺服器是否已安裝的憑證，用戶端與伺服器之間傳送的所有資料使用 SSL 加密。When `true`, SQL Server uses SSL encryption for all data sent between the client and server if the server has a certificate installed. 可辨識的值為 `true`、`false`、`yes` 和 `no`。Recognized values are `true`, `false`, `yes`, and `no`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 連接字串語法](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-syntax.md)。For more information, see [Connection String Syntax](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-syntax.md).

識別碼必須是 128 個字元或更少。The ID must be 128 characters or less.| 下列清單包含連線集區中的值的有效名稱。The following list contains the valid names for connection pooling values within the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [SQL Server 連共用ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md). - 連接的存留期 （或 Load Balance Timeout）Connection Lifetime (or Load Balance Timeout) - EnlistEnlist - Max Pool SizeMax Pool Size - Min Pool SizeMin Pool Size - PoolingPooling 當您設定關鍵字或連接共用需要布林值的值時，您可以使用 [是]，而不是 'true' 和 'no' 而不是 'false'。When you are setting keyword or connection pooling values that require a Boolean value, you can use 'yes' instead of 'true', and 'no' instead of 'false'. 整數值會表示為字串。Integer values are represented as strings. > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 會使用它自己的通訊協定，與 SQL Server 通訊。The .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server uses its own protocol to communicate with SQL Server. 因此，它不支援使用 ODBC 資料來源名稱 (DSN) 連接到 SQL Server，因為它不會新增一個 ODBC 層時。Therefore, it does not support the use of an ODBC data source name (DSN) when connecting to SQL Server because it does not add an ODBC layer. > [!NOTE] > 針對.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 不支援通用資料連結 (UDL) 檔案。Universal data link (UDL) files are not supported for the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server. > [!CAUTION] > 在此版本中，應用程式時應謹慎建構的連接字串，根據使用者輸入 （例如從對話方塊中，並將它附加至連接字串中擷取使用者識別碼和密碼資訊時）。In this release, the application should use caution when constructing a connection string based on user input (for example when retrieving user ID and password information from a dialog box, and appending it to the connection string). 應用程式應該要確定使用者無法內嵌這些值中的其他連接字串參數 (例如，輸入密碼，以做為"validpassword; 資料庫 = somedb"在嘗試附加至不同的資料庫中)。The application should make sure that a user cannot embed additional connection string parameters in these values (for example, entering a password as "validpassword;database=somedb" in an attempt to attach to a different database). 如果您要建構根據使用者輸入的連接字串，請使用新，其驗證的連接字串，並協助消除這個問題。If you need to construct connection strings based on user input, use the new , which validates the connection string and helps to eliminate this problem. 請參閱[連接字串產生器](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Connection String Builders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md) for more information. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並設定之前開啟連接的屬性。The following example creates a and sets the property before opening the connection. summary.span: 將指定的異動登記為分散式異動。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用編列到分散式交易中的方法。You can use the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因為它在登錄中的連接執行個體，請**EnlistTransaction**會充分利用功能命名空間來管理分散式交易，讓最好**EnlistDistributedTransaction**針對此目的。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction** for this purpose. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 分散式交易](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md). 若要登記現有的分散式的交易使用，您可以繼續**EnlistDistributedTransaction**方法，如果已停用自動登記。You can continue to enlist in an existing distributed transaction using the **EnlistDistributedTransaction** method if auto-enlistment is disabled. 在現有的分散式異動中登記可確保，如果認可或回復交易，在資料來源的程式碼所做的修改會也認可或回復就行了。Enlisting in an existing distributed transaction makes sure that, if the transaction is committed or rolled back, modifications made by the code at the data source are also committed or rolled back. `EnlistDistributedTransaction` 如果傳回的例外狀況已經開始使用。`EnlistDistributedTransaction` returns an exception if the has already started a transaction using . 不過，如果交易是在資料來源所啟動的本機交易 (例如，藉由明確執行 BEGIN TRANSACTION 陳述式使用物件)， **EnlistDistributedTransaction**回復本機交易，並要求在現有的分散式交易中編列。However, if the transaction is a local transaction started at the data source (for example, by explicitly executing the BEGIN TRANSACTION statement using an object), **EnlistDistributedTransaction** rolls back the local transaction and enlists in the existing distributed transaction as requested. 您不會收到通知，本機交易已回復，而且會負責管理任何本機交易無法啟動使用。You do not receive notice that the local transaction was rolled back, and are responsible for managing any local transactions not started using .

summary.span: 將指定的異動登記為分散式異動。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用編列到分散式交易中的方法。You can use the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因為它在登錄中的連接執行個體，請**EnlistTransaction**會充分利用功能命名空間來管理分散式交易，讓最好**EnlistDistributedTransaction**，它會使用**System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction**物件。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction**, which uses a **System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction** object. 它也會有稍微不同的語意： 一旦連線明確的交易上編列，無法取消登錄或另一個交易中登記，直到第一筆交易完成為止。It also has slightly different semantics: once a connection is explicitly enlisted on a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes. 如需有關分散式交易的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 分散式交易](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定要`true`，因為例外狀況現在會處理為先前已被視為錯誤事件。When you set to `true`, errors that were previously treated as exceptions are now handled as events. 所有事件會立即引發，而且會由事件處理常式。All events fire immediately and are handled by the event handler. 如果是設定為`false`，然後結尾的程序會處理事件。If is is set to `false`, then events are handled at the end of the procedure. > [!NOTE] > 錯誤嚴重性層級 17 或以上，會使伺服器停止處理該命令必須當做例外狀況處理。An error with a severity level of 17 or above that causes the server to stop processing the command needs to be handled as an exception. 在此情況下會擲回例外狀況，而不理會 事件中如何處理錯誤。In this case, an exception is thrown regardless of how the error is handled in the event. 如需有關處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[連線事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。For more information on working with events, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md). 如需有關 SQL Server 引擎所產生的錯誤的詳細資訊，請參閱[Database Engine 錯誤](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-events-and-errors)。For more information on errors generated by the SQL Server engine, see [Database Engine Errors](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-events-and-errors).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `restrictionValues`可以提供參數*n*深度的特定集合的限制集合所指定的值。The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply *n* depth of values, which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection. 為了特定限制，設定值，並設定其他限制的值，您需要將前述限制設定為`null`，然後放置在您想要指定的值限制為適當的值。In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you need to set the preceding restrictions to `null` and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for. 這個範例是"Tables"集合。An example of this is the "Tables" collection. 如果"Tables"集合中有三個的限制-資料庫、 擁有者，而且資料表名稱，而您想要取回只有資料表擁有者 」 Carl 」 相關聯，您需要將下列值： null、 「 Carl 」。If the "Tables" collection has three restrictions--database, owner, and table name--and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl", you need to pass in the following values: null, "Carl". 如果不傳入的限制值，預設值會用於這項限制中。If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction. 這是為傳入的相同對應`null`，不同的參數值為空字串傳遞。This is the same mapping as passing in `null`, which is different from passing in an empty string for the parameter value. 在此情況下，則為空字串 ("") 會被視為指定參數的值。In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter. 程式碼範例，示範，請參閱。For a code sample demonstrating , see .

span.span: Occurs when SQL Server returns a warning or informational message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要處理的警告或伺服器所傳送的告知性訊息的用戶端應該建立委託以接聽此事件。Clients that want to process warnings or informational messages sent by the server should create an delegate to listen to this event. 嚴重性為 10 的訊息時，就會發生事件，或小於由 SQL Server。The event occurs when a message with a severity of 10 or less is returned by SQL Server. 錯誤和訊息的嚴重性高於 20 造成連線關閉，就會引發嚴重性 11 到 20 之間的訊息。Messages that have a severity between 11 and 20 raise an error and messages that have a severity over 20 causes the connection to close. 如需有關 SQL Server 錯誤層級的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Database Engine 錯誤嚴重性](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-error-severities)。For more information on SQL Server error levels, see [Database Engine Error Severities](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-error-severities). 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱 < [ 連線事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。For more information and an example, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md).

span.span: Opens a database connection with the property settings specified by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接集區中繪製的開啟連接，如果有的話。The draws an open connection from the connection pool if one is available. 否則，它會建立新的 SQL Server 執行個體的連接。Otherwise, it establishes a new connection to an instance of SQL Server. > [!NOTE] > 如果移出範圍，它不封閉。If the goes out of scope, it is not closed. 因此，您必須明確地關閉連接呼叫。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling . > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定當您嘗試連接到執行個體的 SQL Server 和使用 TCP/IP，以外的通訊協定的 1433年以外的連接埠號碼方法失敗。If you specify a port number other than 1433 when you are trying to connect to an instance of SQL Server and using a protocol other than TCP/IP, the method fails. 若要指定 1433年以外的連接埠號碼，包括"server = machinename、 連接埠號碼 」 中使用 TCP/IP 通訊協定與連接字串。To specify a port number other than 1433, include "server=machinename,port number" in the connection string, and use the TCP/IP protocol. > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 需要 「 允許呼叫 unmanaged 的組件 」 啟用的安全性權限 (具有設為`UnmanagedCode`) 以開啟已啟用 SQL 偵錯。The .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server requires the Security permission with "Allows calls to unmanaged assemblies" enabled ( with set to `UnmanagedCode`) to open a with SQL Debugging enabled. ## Examples 下列範例會建立、 開啟它，並顯示其部分屬性。The following example creates a , opens it, and displays some of its properties. 連線會自動關閉結尾`using`區塊。The connection is automatically closed at the end of the `using` block. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.Open Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The implementation returns a Task without blocking the calling thread for both pooled and non-pooled connections.

returns.span: 表示非同步作業的工作。

span.span: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後呼叫，必須傳回直到傳回完成。After calling , must return until the returned is completed. 然後，連接成功，則必須傳回。Then, if the connection was successful, must return . 如果連線失敗，必須傳回。If the connection fails, must return . 呼叫會嘗試取消或關閉對應呼叫。A call to will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding call. 如需有關在.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 的非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步程式設計](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

exception.span: 在工作完成前，對同一個執行個體呼叫 不止一次。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PacketSize As Integer
public: property int PacketSize { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得用來與 SQL Server 執行個體通訊的網路封包大小 (位元組)。

span.span: Gets the size (in bytes) of network packets used to communicate with an instance of SQL Server.

value.span: 網路封包的大小 (位元組)。

span.span: The size (in bytes) of network packets.

value.span: 預設值為 8000。

span.span: The default value is 8000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果應用程式會執行大量複製作業，或傳送或接收大量的 text 或 image 資料，封包大小超過預設值可能會改善效率，因為這會導致較少的網路讀取和寫入作業。If an application performs bulk copy operations, or sends or receives lots of text or image data, a packet size larger than the default may improve efficiency because it causes fewer network read and write operations. 如果應用程式傳送與接收的少量資訊，您可以設定的封包大小為 512 個位元組 (使用中的封包大小值)，即足以應付大部分的資料傳輸作業。If an application sends and receives small amounts of information, you can set the packet size to 512 bytes (using the Packet Size value in the ), which is sufficient for most data transfer operations. 大部分的應用程式的預設封包大小是最佳的。For most applications, the default packet size is best. 可能的 512 到 32767 之間的位元組範圍中的值。 may be a value in the range of 512 and 32767 bytes. 如果值超出此範圍，會產生例外狀況。An exception is generated if the value is outside this range. 設定數字的預設值大於 8000 會造成將多頁配置器的 SQL Server 執行個體，而不是更有效率的 SinglePage 配置器，減少整體的延展性的 SQL server 上的封包。Setting the default value to a number greater than 8000 will cause the packets to use the MultiPage allocator on the instance of SQL Server instead of the much more efficient SinglePage allocator, reducing the overall scalability of the SQL Server. 如需有關 SQL Server 如何使用記憶體的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 記憶體管理架構指南](/sql/relational-databases/memory-management-architecture-guide)。For more information on how SQL Server uses memory, see [Memory Management Architecture Guide](/sql/relational-databases/memory-management-architecture-guide). ## Examples 下列範例會建立，包括設定`Packet Size`設為 512 的連接字串中。The following example creates a , including setting the `Packet Size` to 512 in the connection string. 它會顯示和主控台視窗中的屬性。It displays the and properties in the console window. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.PacketSize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.PacketSize Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.PacketSize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.PacketSize Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
